alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 3:29PM EST until January 06 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, larger creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 325 PM EST, gauge reports indicated that the Little Muskingum River and lower portions of Duck Creek were flooding, although levels are now falling. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Devola. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
